post.body: Is she sick?
You're gonna put your hands in tea? :-P
Problem is, I think having a cold crotch is worse than having cold hands. :-)
Crotch.
I agree. Unfortunately it doesn't work on my wives bberry, and the old mobile site is virtually unusable.
Gotcha! Muchos gracias!
@goldstar_gun @Cwluc How many people can I @ before I can't actually send a message.
@Cwluc No, I think I saw it over THERE.
Is that a euphamism for using the bathroom? (Thats a joke, I know your mom is a lovely person. :-)
At least yours make you blush, mine would make me gag. *shivers*
Perv! :-)
I know, right?!
See, you are artistic! It's a robot snowman wearing a nightie...crossdressing robot snowman...never mind.
Welcome back to the world of the living! Maybe that's premature...
Even tho I'm only marginally good, I love chess. The iPhone app 'Chess with Friends' is probably my most used app.
Anyone else with an iPhone or itouch using the new Flickr mobile site? Man, it is sweet! http://m.flickr.com
...and then...spelling error. *face palm*
See, the joke was, home many names could I fit before there was no room for a message. Clearly, it was a piss poor delivery. :-/
I just went out to feed the dog in shorts. Big mistake. It is sack shrinking cold out there! What he was doing in my shorts, I'll never know
A shot I took of Heather with her EOS XTi. I love it! http://is.gd/cQyK
